subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose, the Chicago Bulls point guard and the N.B.A.’s reigning most valuable player, agreed to a five-year contract extension worth more than $94 million that kicks in next season.
snippet: Derrick Rose, the Chicago Bulls point guard and the N.B.A.’s reigning most valuable player, agreed to a five-year contract extension worth more than $94 million that kicks in next season.
